input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
This Downswept Douglas tree features Feel Real branch tip technology, creating a tree with remarkable realism. These crush-resistant branch tips are molded from real tree branches for an authentic living tree appearance. This tree is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy metal tree stand is included.

This Downswept Douglas Fir Full Pre-Lit Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6.5 feet tall with a 49 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of Feel Real individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and fee
Features 650 clear lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on the tree before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Clear Lights 12''
  - Name='National Tree Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Clear Lights 12''
  - Name='Best Choice Products Hinged Douglas Full Fir Artificial Christmas Tree Holiday Decoration w/ Foldable Metal Stand'
  - Name='Alcott Hill 7ft Pre-Lit Full Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm 3-ft. Farmhouse Fir Christmas Tree with Burlap Bag'
  - Name='National Tree Company 7.5 ft. Pre-Lit Snowy Vintin Fir Tree with LED Lights'
  - Name='Nearly Natural Vancouver Fir Natural Look Artificial Christmas Tree with 350 Clear LED Lights and Bendable Branches'
  - Name='Downswept DouglasFir Pencil Slim Tree with Dual Color LED Lights The Holiday Aisle'
  - Name='Charlton Home 6' Tall Douglas Fir Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Alcott Hill Tall Prelit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Natural Fraser Slim Fir Tree Lights'
  - Name='Haute Decor Pre-lit Mountain Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Natural Wood Pole'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill White Fir Tree 9 ft.'
  - Name='Northlight 4.5' Pre-Lit Medium Buffalo Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Tall Prelit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 5' Colorado Fir Flocked Dusted Artificial Christmas Tree with 300 LED Lights, 514 Bendable Branches and Pinecones in Decorative Planter'
  - Name='Best Choice Products 6ft Pre-Lit Holiday Christmas Pine Tree w/ Snow Flocked Branches'
  - Name='Nearly Natural Montreal Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree with 450 Warm White LED Lights'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 4ft. Flocked Livingston Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Pine Cones and 150 Clear Warm LED Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company Feel-Real Jersey Fraser Fir Hinged Artificial Christmas Tree with 1250 Clear Lights'
  - Name='Nearly Natural Yukon Mountain Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 50 Clear Lights and Pine Cones Planter'
  - Name='4.5Ft Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree Dual Color LED Lights By National Tree Company'
  - Name='National Tree Company 9-ft. Pre-lit Downswept Douglas Fir Pencil Slim Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='4 ft. Pre-Lit Artificial Twig Tree with 240 Warm White LED Lights'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Best Choice Products Hinged Douglas Full Fir Artificial Christmas Tree Holiday Decoration w/ Foldable Metal Stand
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar fir type and hinged/foldable branches with metal stand, offering functional and silhouette similarities but different brand and slightly less detail on lighting.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Alcott Hill 7ft Pre-Lit Full Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit full Douglas Fir tree of similar height; likely similar branch fullness and construction but different brand and unclear if it has hinged branches or Feel Real tips.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm 3-ft. Farmhouse Fir Christmas Tree with Burlap Bag
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Smaller farmhouse fir tree with no mention of pre-lit function, hinged branches, or high realism features; also much smaller size.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 7.5 ft. Pre-Lit Snowy Vintin Fir Tree with LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, pre-lit fir tree; however, different fir type (Vintin Fir), snowy finish, possibly different branch construction and lighting tech.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural Vancouver Fir Natural Look Artificial Christmas Tree with 350 Clear LED Lights and Bendable Branches
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar natural look fir with clear LED lights and bendable branches, but smaller light count and different brand and fir type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Downswept DouglasFir Pencil Slim Tree with Dual Color LED Lights The Holiday Aisle
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same Downswept Douglas Fir type but a pencil slim silhouette differing from full bodied and dual color LED lights rather than clear.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charlton Home 6' Tall Douglas Fir Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar height, same tree type with pre-lit feature, but unclear about hinged branches or Feel Real tips, different brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Alcott Hill Tall Prelit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar product type and features with pre-lit and Douglas Fir tree, but different brand and unspecified details on branch construction and lighting tech.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Natural Fraser Slim Fir Tree Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and pre-lit tree, but different tree type (Fraser Fir), slim silhouette unlike reference full bodied Downswept Douglas Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Haute Decor Pre-lit Mountain Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Natural Wood Pole
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different fir type (Mountain Fir) and construction (natural wood pole), less similar in silhouette and possibly branch style to reference Downswept Douglas Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill White Fir Tree 9 ft.
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand but different fir type (Dunhill White Fir), larger size, no mention of pre-lit or specific features like hinged branches.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 4.5' Pre-Lit Medium Buffalo Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar pre-lit function but different fir type (Buffalo Fir), smaller size and possibly different branch construction and fullness.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same fir type, artificial tree with probable similar silhouette, but less information about lighting and branch technology.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Tall Prelit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same fir type, pre-lit, similar tall silhouette; probable similar construction though different brand and unknown hinged branches or Feel Real tips.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 5' Colorado Fir Flocked Dusted Artificial Christmas Tree with 300 LED Lights, 514 Bendable Branches and Pinecones in Decorative Planter
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar artificial fir tree with LED lights and bendable branches but smaller size, flocked finish, and different fir type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Best Choice Products 6ft Pre-Lit Holiday Christmas Pine Tree w/ Snow Flocked Branches
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pine tree rather than fir, with flocked branches, differing silhouette and branch construction, though pre-lit and similar size.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural Montreal Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree with 450 Warm White LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different tree type (Montreal Spruce), smaller light count, and different brand suggest lower relevancy despite similar pre-lit function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 4ft. Flocked Livingston Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Pine Cones and 150 Clear Warm LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different fir type, smaller size, flocked finish, and fewer lights make this less relevant to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Feel-Real Jersey Fraser Fir Hinged Artificial Christmas Tree with 1250 Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand with hinged branch construction and Feel Real technology, but different fir species (Jersey Fraser Fir) and higher light count.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural Yukon Mountain Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 50 Clear Lights and Pine Cones Planter
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different fir type (Yukon Mountain Fir), very low light count, smaller size and dÃ©cor style less similar to reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 4.5Ft Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree Dual Color LED Lights By National Tree Company
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and tree type but smaller size (4.5 ft vs 6.5 ft) and dual color LEDs instead of clear; still very relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 9-ft. Pre-lit Downswept Douglas Fir Pencil Slim Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and tree type but pencil slim silhouette instead of full bodied, larger height; pre-lit with similar features otherwise.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 4 ft. Pre-Lit Artificial Twig Tree with 240 Warm White LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Completely different style and construction (twig tree), smaller size, different look and brand features; very low relevancy.
